participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to keep track of my belongings better.
i like to refurbish classic cars.
i enjoy eating vegetarian food.
i love disney movies.
i care about the way i look when i am in public.

participant_2.background:
I am a seamstress from the Midwest.
i live in celebration , florida.
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
my family means the world to me.
i just graduated high school.

content.text: Hi there, I hope you are having a great day!
Hey there! I am doing well, how are you?
I am doing well, thank you! I just got back from a trip to the Midwest.
The Midwest? That's neat! I'm from the Midwest, I live in Celebration, Florida now.
Oh wow, that's a long way from the Midwest! What made you move all the way to Florida?
My family moved here a few years ago, and I just graduated high school so I came down with them.
Oh that makes sense. What are you planning on doing now that you've graduated high school?
I'm not sure yet, I'm thinking about going to college but I'm not sure where yet.
Well you have plenty of time to figure that out! I'm sure you'll make a great decision.
Thank you, I hope so! What do you do for a living?
I'm a seamstress, I make clothes and other things from fabric.
That's really neat! I've always been interested in sewing but I've never really had the time to learn.
You should give it a try! It's really fun and you can make a lot of cool things.
I might have to, thanks for the suggestion!
No problem, have a great day!
